featured.text: At various times in history, the White House has been known as the “President’s Palace,” the “President’s House,” and the “Executive Mansion.”

definition.zh_def: 宮殿，通常是君主或高級官員的居住地，具有豪華的建築和裝飾。
definition.en_def: A large and impressive building, typically the official residence of a sovereign, bishop, or other high-ranking person.
definition.example: The king invited his guests to a grand feast in the palace.
